attributes.action: Make school children over the legal age accountable by making bullying illegal.
attributes.additional_details:
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/mum-found-11-year-old-8938360

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-3811284/Horrific-video-shows-schoolgirl-bully-beating-13-year-old-girl-gang-jeering-boys-cheer-on.html
http://www.mirror.co.uk/news/uk-news/shocking-bullying-video-shows-teen-8920228
This is just the start. Those who also record and not intervene should be held accountable too.
attributes.background: After reading in the media for the past week or so how many children have been assaulted, ranging from an assault where the child has lost consciousness to a child losing their life from hanging its time the government stepped in and made those who are over 10 accountable for their own actions.

rejection.details:
This petition has been rejected because it is similar to the following petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/161936

You might want to consider signing this petition.
